trait.name: Illumination
entries: While it has at least 1 hit point, the astral blight sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The blight doesn't require air or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blight makes two Heat-Draining Vine attacks.

action.name: Heat-Draining Vine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) radiant damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The blight has two vines, each of which can grapple one creature.
